channel.title: I portfarwarded
channel.description: hi dudes.. ehm i portfarwarded.. and i run server and join my server. and then i check my ip on this site.. and it aint online .. then i open utorrent, and changed the port to 43594. then it is online.. but then when i try to connect to my server.. i can't .. i cannot connect to my server with any ip.. not even 127.0.0.1.. can someone help me fix this plox?

item.title: I portfarwarded
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

hmm… Check if you entered the same ip’s (Client sided or in your Situation source sided)

Read full topic

item.title: I portfarwarded
item.dc:creator: @klump klump
item.description:
@klump wrote:

[quote=“Host Gushers, post:6, topic:479232”]windows button>search for firewall>click it>go to inbound rules>add>and follow the processes>do it for udp and tcp.[/quote] nope now i get this error
java.net.BindException: Address already in use: JVM_Bind
at java.net.DualStackPlainSocketImpl.bind0(Native Method)
at java.net.DualStackPlainSocketImpl.socketBind(Unknown Source)
at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.bind(Unknown Source)
at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.bind(Unknown Source)
at java.net.ServerSocket.bind(Unknown Source)
at java.net.ServerSocket.(Unknown Source)
at java.net.ServerSocket.(Unknown Source)
at DavidScape.net.SocketListener.(SocketListener.java:36)
at DavidScape.Server.main(Server.java:50)
Tryk på en vilkårlig tast for at fortsætte . . .

Read full topic

item.title: I portfarwarded
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

windows button>search for firewall>click it>go to inbound rules>add>and follow the processes>do it for udp and tcp.

Read full topic

item.title: I portfarwarded
item.dc:creator: @klump klump
item.description:
@klump wrote:

and how do i make my firewall accept the 43594 port?

Read full topic

item.title: I portfarwarded
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

Let your Firewall accept the port 43594 UDP + TCP / Unblock utorrent via firewall

Read full topic

item.title: I portfarwarded
item.dc:creator: @Creative_I Creative I
item.description:
@Creative_I wrote:

[quote=“klump, post:1, topic:479232”]hi dudes… ehm i portfarwarded… and i run server and join my server. and then i check my ip on this site… and it aint online … then i open utorrent, and changed the port to 43594. then it is online… but then when i try to connect to my server… i can’t …
i cannot connect to my server with any ip… not even 127.0.0.1…
can someone help me fix this plox?[/quote]

Same thing was happening to me with utorrent, it has to do with ur firewall. There are many different tuts on how to fix that problem, search it on google. I just ended up not using utorrent and portfowarded threw my gateway.

Read full topic

item.title: I portfarwarded
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

utorrent might be blocking something. Also for the first one without utorrent make sure u allowed it in the firewall.

Read full topic
